variables.login-keep-logged-in-label: Keep my account active in this browser
variables.alert-user-or-password-invalid: Invalid username and/or password. Please try again.
variables.alert-user-inactive: User inactive in the system, please contact support to restore your account.
variables.alert-without-permission: You do not have permission to access this location.
variables.alert-there-is-a-field: There is already a registration for the field #label# with the same value: #value#. Please choose another #label# and try again.
variables.alert-authorization-provisory-not-define: It is not allowed to change any user data without provisional authorization.
variables.restrict-area-info: Please enter your password below and then click the Send button to provisionally authorize the modification of any sensitive data in your account.
variables.alert-password-invalid: Incorrect password! You have #tentativas# more attempts, otherwise you will be automatically disconnected!
variables.alert-password-invalid-finish: Incorrect password! You have been automatically disconnected from the system due to excessive incorrect password entries. You will need to enter username and password to access again.
